headline: AMD: Post-Earnings Dip Presents An Appealing Opportunity To Investors (Rating Upgrade)
summary: AMD upgraded to Strong Buy with a $279 target as MI350/MI400 GPUs drive AI data center growth and margin expansion. Click to know more.

headline: Why Analysts See Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) Story Shifting After Juniper Deal And Margin Risks
summary: Hewlett Packard Enterprise’s story in the market has shifted more in tone than in raw numbers, with the model fair value estimate holding steady at about US$26.44 per share even as the discount rate edges up to 10.49%. That small change reflects a slightly higher required return being baked into the model while long term revenue growth assumptions remain anchored, a balance that lines up with a mixed research backdrop where optimism around the Juniper networking deal meets concern over...
